title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and role-based access control for secure user access.
description: Develop a robust login system that leverages multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure secure customer access to the self-service portal. Configure role-based access controls (RBAC) to limit user permissions based on their authorization level and profile. This epic includes encryption of credentials, secure session handling, and compliance with financial security standards to safeguard sensitive banking data from unauthorized access.

title: Responsive and Intuitive User Interface
summary: Design a responsive, user-friendly interface accessible across multiple devices.
description: Create a modern, responsive design that adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices to provide an intuitive and unified experience. Ensure that the interface is visually appealing, accessible, and optimized for performance. Implement usability best practices such as minimal navigation paths, consistent layouts, and accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 standards to support diverse customer needs.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Visibility
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and customer data.
description: Build a dynamic dashboard that presents personalized banking information, including account summaries, available services, and product recommendations based on the customer's profile and eligibility. Integrate real-time data retrieval from the bank’s systems to display up-to-date account balances and offers. Ensure that the dashboard layout is configurable for future product enhancements and user customization.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable digital submission of account opening and service modification requests.
description: Develop end-to-end digital workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or modify existing banking services. Ensure guided, step-by-step user experiences with pre-filled data, real-time field validation, and minimal clicks to improve efficiency. Include approval routing and backend synchronization for consistent data flow between the portal and the bank’s internal systems, reducing manual intervention and turnaround time.

title: Application Draft Saving and Document Uploads
summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and upload supporting documents securely.
description: Implement functionality for saving partially completed applications so customers can return later to complete them without losing progress. Enable secure document upload capabilities, allowing users to attach identification and supporting documents directly within the portal. Ensure that uploaded files are encrypted at rest and in transit, stored securely, and linked to respective requests for processing and verification.

title: Request Tracking and Notification System
summary: Provide real-time tracking and notifications for all customer requests.
description: Develop a centralized request tracking system where customers can monitor the status of submitted applications or service modification requests. Implement automated real-time notifications via email and portal alerts for different stages of the workflow. Ensure that customers can opt in to notification preferences while maintaining compliance with security and privacy policies for communication delivery.

title: Core Banking Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking platform.
description: Design and implement an integration layer to establish secure, reliable communication between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system. Use APIs or middleware for real-time data exchange, ensuring synchronization of customer information, account details, and service requests. Include performance monitoring, data caching, and retry mechanisms to maintain system stability and prevent transaction data loss.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Implement an independent, optimized database to support portal operations.
description: Build a dedicated database to handle portal data effectively, ensuring independence from the core banking database for performance optimization. Implement efficient indexing, caching, and load-balancing mechanisms to support high concurrency and minimal latency. Integrate monitoring tools and create contingencies for failover, data recovery, and audit retention to ensure stable operations under various workloads.

title: Comprehensive Audit Trail and Interaction History
summary: Record detailed logs and histories of all customer and system interactions.
description: Create a secure audit logging subsystem that captures all customer activities, such as logins, submissions, document uploads, and request modifications. Provide customers with a viewable history of their actions for transparency while storing immutable backend logs for compliance and regulatory review. Use encrypted storage, timestamping, and access logging to comply with data retention and banking audit standards.
